Title: New $200 HEIDI DAUS Alice Looking Glass Divine Equine Pin Brooch Stunning
Description: Heidi Daus "Equine Dandy" Crystal Horse Brooch Pin Was it all just a dream? A magical world beyond your imagination? Talking animals, villainous queens and knights, shrinking potions. Awaken your jewelry collection with this animated Divine Equine Dandy brooch. Exclusively created for Disney's Alice Through the Looking Glass, this extraordinary design takes your fantastical fashion on a spectacular style adventure. THIS LOVELY HORSE MAN IF YOU WILL IS SO COLORFUL AND INTRIGUING. LOADED WITH SO MANY BEAUTIFUL PAVE SET WITH MULTI COLORED CRYSTALS AS ONLY HEIDI DAUS CAN DO. SQUARE, BAGUETTES, MARQUISE AND ROUND CRYSTALS Design Information: Dimensional mister sophisticated horse design features a dapper horse head and gent's body in fancy, formal wear carrying a baguette crystal sword. Design covered with pavé-set, round multicolor crystals; Bezel-set round and marquise-cut crystal accents Crystal Information: This piece contains clear, purple velvet-, tanzanite-, emerald-, fern green-, light sapphire-, Capri blue- and jet hematite-color crystals Measurements: Approx. 2-7/8"L x 3-1/4"W x 9/16"H br> Metal Color: Bronze tone Findings: Joint-and-catch closure Finish: Oxidized, polished Wow... What a sophisticated collectible pin. Such detail and gorgeous coloring. RETAIL PRICE: $200 Brand new, Comes Boxed in gift box Warranty: Manufacturer's lifetime limited A magnificent collector’s item to add to your brooch/pin collection. Beautifully handcrafted, this Divine Horse Equine is done to Perfection. MADE WITH SWAROVSKI® ELEMENTS. Timeless beauty, this will become an heirloom piece. Elegance and refinement is the look, lovely decorated jewel pin. About the Designer: Heidi Daus. Timeless elegance and heirloom charm imbue these high-end, vintage-style jewelry pieces that offer distinct design and signature color. Each Heidi Daus creation is handcrafted for exceptional beauty, using such treasures as semi-precious stones, crystals and antique gold finishes. Cutting-edge technology combines metals, finishes and textures into antique reproductions and art-deco inspired pieces that are in a class by themselves. Email questions prior to bidding. Shipping via Priority Mail, includes full insurance and tracking, $6.95. Returns accepted within 14 days, must be returned with tag intact, as shipped, and buyer pays return shipping. There is a 10% restocking fee. Please bid carefully. Thank you. Comes from a non-smoking home.
